text: There are very few easy buttons in trading, but I'll give you one right now. Before, every single trade you put on define your profit and lost targets. I know, nothing revolutionary, something that you should be doing already, but most people don't do that. Why? Because it takes work. You're trying to answer a unknowable question because the event hasn't unfolded yet. However, going through that process, sexy up to be able to make better decisions as the process unfolds. It doesn't magically get easier when you're in a trade and lose an abunchie money. Be in our IOC all day.

metadata.title: Trading EASY Button #trading #stockmarket #optionstrading

▬ ABOUT ERIK  ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
My name is Erik, I'm a Marine veteran, options trader, real estate and angel investor. From 2007, I spent over 30,000 hours honing my skillset and became a first generation millionaire before 30. I'm is passionate about self-development, life experiences, human performance, and helping others grow. I launched the esInvests YouTube channel and the Outlier community to share his experience and empower others to proactively craft their futures.
